get.description:
List of controller instances.
If the following GET arguments are present different controllers will be listed:
- `system_id` and `unassigned` - controller instances which don't have a system and that belong
the given system's company will be listed
- `system_id` - all controller instances that belong to the system's company
- `unassigned` - all controllers that don't have a system and that belong to the user's company
- no GET arguments - all controllers that belong to the user's company
get.summary: List of controller instances.

get.description:
Get a given controller instance's information.
If `refetch_logic_loops=1` is passed as a GET argument the controller's logic loops are updated.
If the controller's system is shared with the user's company, the controller can be accessed too,
even if the controller doesn't belong to the user's company.
get.summary: Get a given controller instance's information.

get.description:
Get controller instance log.
Returns the last 500 lines of the log file

post.description:
Share a system with another company.
Following restrictions are applied:
- You cannot share a system with the same company.
- You can only share a system with descendant companies.
- The system must not be shared with another company for the same period.
